description: Professor Sycamore`s Gible was brought to the lab by Alan to be healed after it rampaged through the city and got injured. After also rampaging through the lab, Professor Sycamore befriended the Gible and it stayed at the lab with him. While at the lab, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Gabite.
name: Fukamaru (Platane-hakase)
